channel.title: (PI) Client Rep++
channel.description:
Basically, my maps don't load properly, and I have to re-login for them to be fixed, and if I re-login again there fine, so I was wondering if there's a way of fixing the Maps or just simply inserting a method that disconnects people when they first login and then after that they can just login.
Regards, James.

item.title: (PI) Client Rep++
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

If I did that then wouldn’t that handle the players every time they login they’re disconnected? =[]

Read full topic

item.title: (PI) Client Rep++
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

disconnected = true;

No method required, although that doesn’t seem like the best way to handle the problem.

Read full topic
